subSubSection.paragraph: Description. Snout very prominent, with a sharp keratinised horizontal edge on rostral and nasals (in young specimens this is feeble or absent); rostral very large, unguiform, length/width ratio 1.11–1.47 (mean = 1.29); frontal crescentic; supraocular transverse, its lateral apex between preocular and ocular; eye distinct, near or beneath the anterior edge of ocular; nasal in contact with first and second labials, nasal suture arising from first; SIP T-II-O or T-X (N2, P/O, O, O). MSR 32–45 (mean = 37.0, n = 169); MD 345–620 (mean = 427.4, n = 164); vertebrae 175–206 (mean = 189.7, n = 21); MD/V ratio 1.98–2.53 (mean = 2.20, n = 21), L/D ratio 19–46 (mean = 28.2, n = 127). There is great geographical variation in the middorsal scale count, which is lowest in southern Angola and highest in southern Mozambique . There also appears to be little overlap in male counts between the southeastern populations (S Mozambique , South Africa , Botswana , East Caprivi) and the northwestern ones ( Angola , Namibia ). Thusly, SE males—MD = 382–494 (mean = 413.5, S.D. = 32.95, n = 14); NW males—MD = 350–376 (mean = 363.3, S.D. = 8.76, n = 6); SE females—MD = 403–498 (mean = 451.9, S.D. = 31.37, n = 12), NW females—MD = 407–440 (mean = 423.3, S.D. = 10.95, n = 7). Usually marbled or speckled black and white above, sometimes uniform black or with scattered white scales, but SAM 19905 has only a narrow white mid-ventral stripe. Venter usually immaculate, rarely with irregular black speckling or a black mid-ventral stripe. Largest specimen (NKW 246—Pretorius Kop, Kruger National Park, South Africa ) has a total length of 804 mm .

Distribution. Southern Mozambique , northern KwaZulu-Natal, Swaziland , through the northeastern provinces of South Africa and central Botswana to northern Namibia and southeastern Angola , NSL- 1775 m ( Figs. 16–17 ).

Tshaneni BMNH 1975.118–120; NMZB-UM 31458, 32707–10; TMP —; Vuvulane BMNH 1975.121. MOZAMBIQUE . Alves de Lima NMZB-UM 30630–31; Chibuto PEM 15562 , 15567–68; Chimonzo TMP 29392 ; Delagoa Bay BMNH 1888.6.25.10, 1891.9.15.6; SAM 1853; TMP 4902, 4906, 4909; Mambone CZL —; Miquia NMZB-UM 30632–33; Pande FMNH 190714, 200283; Rikatla MMK —; Unguana NMZB-UM 28461; Zinave NMZB-UM 26997, 28431, 29381, 30634.
